column2: "Asɛm a ofi EWURADZE nkyɛn baa Jeremia hɔ wɔ Judahen Zedekia n'afe a otsia du no a
column3: ɔyɛ Nebukadenezar n'afe a otsia duawɔtwe no mu no."

column2: "Aber no na nkyii Babilɔnhen no dɔm kotuaa Jerusalɛm: na wɔdze nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia too efiadze wɔ ɔweɔmfo bagua no a ɔwɔ Judahen ne fie no mu."
"Na Judahen Zedekia dze no too efiadze
column3: dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ehyɛ nkɔm
column8: medze kurow yi mebɛhyɛ Babilɔnhen nsa

column3: na oyi ara na wobeyi no ahyɛ Babilɔnhen nsa
column4: na ɔnye no akasa ano na ano

column3: na hɔ na ɔbɛtsena ekodu dɛ mebɛsera no
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse: kaansa hom nye Kaldeafo ko mpo a

column3: EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ
column7: wo wɔfa Sallum ne ba Hanamel bɛba wo nkyɛn
column9: Tɔ mo mfuwa a ɔwɔ Anathot no; na ɔwo na no pon ho kwan dzi wɔ wo dɛ ebɔtɔ."

column2: "Nna mo wɔfa ba Hanamel baa me nkyɛn wɔ aweɔmfo abangua no do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm tse no na ɔsee me dɛ
column5: tɔ mo mfuwa a ɔwɔ Anathot a ɔwɔ Benjamin asaase do no: na ɔwo na adze no ne dzi yɛ wodze
column6: na no pon dzi wɔ wo; tɔ ma woho. Nna muhun dɛ EWURADZE asɛm no nye no."

column2: "Na motɔɔ asaase a ɔwɔ Anathot no wɔ mo wɔfa ba Hanamel hɔ
column3: na mikeer dwɛɛtɛɛ no memaa no
na mosɔɔw ano
column5: na mikeer dwɛɛtɛɛ no wɔ nsɛn mu memaa no."

column3: dza wɔsɔɔw ano
column4: dɛ mbrɛ mbra na atɔrmuadze se no
column5: na dza n'ano da hɔ no nyina:"

column2: "na medze ɔtɔ nwoma no mehyɛɛ Maseia ba Neria ne ba Baruk nsa
column3: wɔ no wɔfa ba Hanamel n'enyim
column4: na adasefo a wɔdze hɔn nsa hyɛɛ ɔtɔ nwoma no ase wɔ Juda a wɔtsetse ɔweɔmfo abanguado hɔ nyina enyim no enyim."

column3: dɛ
column6: Israel Nyankopɔn se nye yi: Fa nwoma iyinom
column9: na nwoma yi a n'ano da hɔ nyinara
column10: na fa hyɛ dɛtsesɛn bi mu; na ɔaakyɛr nda pii."

column3: Israel Nyankopɔn
column4: se nye yi: Wɔbɛda ho atotɔ adan
column6: na wenyin nture wɔ asaase yi do bio."

column2: "Afei medze ɔtɔ nwoma no maa Neria ba Baruk n'ekyir no
column3: miyii mpaa maa EWURADZE
column7: ɔwo na edze wo tum kɛse na wo basa a atsen yɛɛ ɔsor na asaase; biribiara nnyɛ wo yɛ na:"

column3: na itua egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ kaw gu hɔn mba a wodzi hɔn ekyir hɔn bo mu: ne dzin dze ɔkɛse
ndwuma mu ɔkatakyi: ɔwo w'enyiwa bue wɔ adasamba akwan nyina do; dɛ edze bɛma obiara dɛ mbrɛ n'akwan tse
column4: na dɛ mbrɛ ne ndzeyɛɛ aba tse:"

column2: "ɔwo emaa nsɛnkyerɛdze na anwanwadze sii Egypt asaase do
column3: dze bodu ndɛ da yi mpo
column4: wɔ Israel na amanaman nyina mu; na edze gyee dzin maa woho
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi;"

column3: na nsa a ɔyɛ dzen
column6: yii wo man Israel fii Egypt asaase do;"

column2: "na emaa hɔn asaase yi a ekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom dɛ edze bɛma hɔn no
column3: asaase a ɔpem numfonsu na ewo;"
na woenntsie wo ndze
column4: eso wɔannantsew wo mbra do; wɔannyɛ dza ehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ no nyinara mu biara: dɛm ntsi na ama mbusu yi nyina aba hɔn do yi:"

column3: mpempe no wɔaba kurow no ho dɛ wɔrebɛgye; na wɔdze kurow no ahyɛ Kaldeafo a wɔnye no roko nsa
column6: na ɔyardɔm no ntsi na dza ekae no aba mu; na hwɛ w'enyi tua."

column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column6: na frɛ ho adasefo; na eso na kurow no wɔdze ahyɛ Kaldeafo nsa."

column3: dɛ
column7: adasa nyinara Nyankopɔn: aso biribiara wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ dzen ma me?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column3: medze kurow yi bɛhyɛ Kaldeafo nsa

column2: "na Kaldeafo a wɔnye kurow yi roko no
column3: wɔbɛba abɔto kurow yi mu ogya
column5: ɔnye efiefi a wɔahyehyew n'etsifi nduhuam ama Baal
column6: na woehue ɔnom afɔr ama abosom afofor
column7: dɛ wɔdze riyi me ebufuw no."

column2: "Na Israelmba na Judamba wɔayɛ dza ɔyɛ mbusu ara wɔ m'enyim ofir hɔn mbofraber mu: na Israelmba wɔdze hɔn nsaano edwuma eyi me ebufuw ara
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Na kurow yi eyi me ebufuw na ebufuhyew ara ofi da a wɔkyekyeree dze bodu ndɛ da yi mpo; ma meeyi no efi m'enyi do:"
"wɔ Israelmba na Judamba hɔn mbusu nyinara a wɔabɔ dze eyi me ebufuw no ntsi hɔn
column3: hɔn ahemfo
na nnyɛ hɔn enyim a: na kaansa makyerɛkyerɛ hɔn
column4: mosoɛr ahema na mekyerɛkyerɛ hɔn mpo a

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn ekyiwadze sisii ofi a wɔdze me dzin ato no no mu
column3: dɛ wongu ho fi."

column2: "Na wosisii Baal no nsorɔnsorɔmbea a ɔwɔ Hinom bɔnsa no mu
column3: dɛ wɔremma hɔn mbabanyin na hɔn mbabaa edua ogya mu ama Molek a nnyɛ emi na mehyɛɛ hɔn no mu
column5: dɛ wɔyɛ dɛm ekyiwadze yi; ma Juda aayɛ bɔn."

column3: Israel Nyankopɔn
column4: se wɔ kurow yi a hom ka wɔ ho dɛ
column8: na ɔyardɔm mu no ho nye yi:"

column3: emi mara mobɔboa hɔn ano mefi asaase nyina a mapam hɔn makɔ do wɔ m'ebufuw
column5: na m'enyiber kɛse mu no; na medze hɔn bɛsan aba bea yi do bio

column3: na emi so mayɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn:"

column2: "na mebɛma hɔn akoma kor na ɔkwan kor
column3: ama woeesuro me afebɔɔ; wɔ hɔnara na hɔn mba a wobedzi hɔn ekyir hɔn yie ntsi:"
dɛ mebɛyɛ hɔn yie; na medze mo suro bɛhyɛ hɔn akoma mu
m'enyi bɛgye hɔn ho dɛ mebɛyɛ hɔn yie
column4: na medze m'akoma nyina na me kra nyina matsɛw hɔn asaase yi do nokwar mu."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Dɛ mbrɛ medze mbusu kɛse yi nyinara maba ɔman yi do no
column3: dɛmara so na medze yie a mabɔ hɔn ho anohoba nyina mebɛba hɔn do."

column2: "Na wɔbɔtotɔ mfuwa wɔ asaase yi a hom ka wɔ ho dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ amamfo
column4: nyimpa anaa abowa nnyi do; wɔdze ahyɛ Kaldeafo nsa no mu."

column3: na wɔdze hɔn nsa ahyehyɛ nwoma ase na wɔasosɔw ano
column6: na mbeambea a etwa Jerusalɛm ho ehyia
column10: na Pomu afamu nkurow mu: na medze hɔn ndɔmmum mebɛsan maba
